text: Tyo vyakti jasale ratako samayama sajada (upasana) gardacha ra upasanama ubhirahancha, akhiratasita darcha ra aphno palanakartako dayako asa rakhdacha tyo ra yasako viparita garnevala ke barabara huna sakdachan? Bhana ki ‘‘ke uniharu jo jnani chan ra uniharu jo ajnani chan duvai samana hunechan? Niscitarupale siksa ta tinaile grahana garchan jo bud'dhivala (saksama) chan.’’
